entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Coronation
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:22 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coronation 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow or freezing rain beginning this morning then changing to periods of rain mixed with freezing rain this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain changing to a few flurries and freezing rain and ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
